<h2>Get Active Configuration Value</h2>

<h3>Description</h3>

<p>Retrieves a specific configuration value from a YAML configuration file.
</p>


<h3>Usage</h3>

<pre><code class='language-R'>get_active_config(value = NULL, file = here::here("config.yml"))
</code></pre>


<h3>Arguments</h3>

<table>
<tr><td><code id="value">value</code></td>
<td>
<p>A character vector specifying the configuration key(s) to retrieve.</p>
</td></tr>
<tr><td><code id="file">file</code></td>
<td>
<p>Path to the YAML configuration file (default: &quot;config.yml&quot;).</p>
</td></tr>
</table>


<h3>Details</h3>

<p>Validates input parameters, ensures the file is readable, and retrieves
configuration value(s) using 'config::get'. Active configuration is set by
the 'R_CONFIG_ACTIVE' environment variable.
</p>


<h3>Value</h3>

<p>Value(s) associated with the specified key(s) in the configuration file.
</p>
